Package org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.smpso

Class SMPSO

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.impl.AbstractParticleSwarmOptimization<DoubleSolution,​java.util.List<DoubleSolution>>
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.smpso.SMPSO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Algorithm<java.util.List<DoubleSolution>>, DescribedEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
SMPSOMeasures
public class SMPSO
extends AbstractParticleSwarmOptimization<DoubleSolution,​java.util.List<DoubleSolution>>
This class implements the SMPSO algorithm described in: SMPSO: A new PSO-based metaheuristic for multi-objective optimization MCDM 2009. DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/MCDM.2009.4938830
Author:
Antonio J. Nebro
See Also:
